snippet: The Shabab militant group claimed responsibility for the attack, saying it was intended to strike a blow against Somali and Ethiopian troops stationed in the city.
abstract: At least 12 people are killed in a bombing in a busy market in the southern Somalian city of Baidoa; the Shabab militant group claims responsibility for the bombing.
lead_paragraph: The Shabab militant group claimed responsibility for the attack, saying it was intended to strike a blow against Somali and Ethiopian troops stationed in the city.

headline.main: Somalia: Militants’ Bomb Kills at Least 12 at a Market
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Militants’ Bomb Kills at Least 12 at a Market
